Actions.Name: Agonize
Actions.Effects: The [name] dashes up to 8 spaces before this attack. It deals additional damage equal to how far it traveled before it attacked.

Combo.Name: Exfoliate
Combo.Description: Repeat the following effect three times.
Combo.Effects: An adjacent foe must save or take [D]+[fray], or [fray] damage on a failed save. Bloodied foes gain +1 curse on the save.

Actions.Name: Spit Fire
Actions.Effects: The [name] can spend additional actions on this ability. For every action spent, it increases the range and damage by +2.

Actions.Name: Spin Out
Actions.Description: Adjacent foes must save or become blinded, then the [name] gains stealth.
